column3: “I smoked Northern Lights Skunk (labeled for me 'NLX Skunk', and this Northern Skunk seems to be the closest to it for review). I woke up in pain from my back and hips which is pretty severe most days, I used NLX Skunk to medicate for the first time. I waited for the effects to kick in which took only a few minutes and my pain started to dissipate very quickly and it didn't put me on couch lock. I have plenty of energ...”

“Northern Lights x Skunk -
High Frequency Farms -

THCA 24.3%

CANNABINOID TOTAL: 24.3%

Immediately upon smelling this strain for the first time, my curiosity arose. I couldn't help but sniff the bag multiple times. Excellent aroma. I could definitely smell a skunkiness but the flower also had a nice piny citrusy dash of pungency. 

This is a nice bud for a day off or an evening after a hard day's work. On my current...”
“I rarely sample a pure indica.  Very very relaxing and blissful.  If you want to be lazy.....don't hesitate to try this strain. Has a muscle relaxing quality as well.”
“picked this up from PARC last batch they had, definitely love it. Hoping it'll be there still when I get paid. For me it's super sedating, nice stoney high. Lasts a couple hours.”

“A Sensi classic, heavy hitting hybrid. 26% on my grow, centerfold worthy buds- fluffy and frosted. Aromatic of sweet- sour mango cocoa annd a touch of mint (it tastes like weed, these are nuances). Devoid of skunk smell despite the moniker. Hybrid comes true on the effects with heavy body high yet cerebral effect great for music or classic movies. Within the hour sleep takes over then munchies . Cheezits and peanut b...”

“I just have to review it again. As one of my strains that I grow, it is hands down one of my very favorites next to blue dream. It is the perfect blend of a 50/50 that you can get. Great for evening, watching tv and relaxing, and then when you are ready to doze off, you sleep blissfully the whole night with no drowsy after-effects the next morning. I am totally in love with this strain..”

“GLW's Northern Skunk is pure indica goodness. Makes me happy and uplifted and yet very relaxed. Eases depression and anxiety and yet allows me to get shit done. Fully cerebral and physical at the same time. I stay chilling on their Northern Skunk. This strain never gets boring!  Works great for nausea.”
“full body high. sweet skunky smell. all around good. not top shelf.”
“Very nice high and very smooth while smoking. When you smoke more then 3g colours get brighter which is kinda cool.”
“overall great high”

“Northern Skunk is worth getting it whenever you see it.  Something about this hybrid works perfect for my insomnia, nausea, and pain.  The stoney high lasts for hours.

Can't wait until I get my hands on some Northern Skunk concentrate....”
“great high long lasting effects.”

“great strain that leaves you relaxed but not super couch locked like a heavy indica leaves you but it is more indica dominant. It smells GREAT its earthy with a strong skunk aroma. I got a gram of it and it is a couple small but really dense nugs. it started out pretty euphoric and heady but after a bit it went to couchlock. overall great strain and a new fave.”
“Burns a long time - really good brand - MPX I would recommend this one highly”
“Powerful pain relief for the day time”

“Method of consumption: Volcano Vaporizer

Pros: Relaxing and mild pain relief. Some mild euphoria, more on the uplifting side.

Cons: Major Dry Mouth. Have something to drink nearby.

Taste/ Draw: Earthy/Skunky. While draw was normal, exhale was a little harsh at times with some spice/peppery hints.

Overall/Other: No real couch lock, some munchies. Effects started to take place between 5 - 10 mins. More relaxing tha...”

“Method of consumption: Volcano Vaporizer

Pros: Relaxing and mild pain relief. Some mild euphoria, more on the uplifting side.

Cons: Major Dry Mouth. Have something to drink nearby.

Taste/ Draw: Earthy/Skunky. While draw was normal, exhale was a little harsh at times with some spice/peppery hints.

Overall/Other: No real couch lock, some munchies. Effects started to take place between 5 - 10 mins. More relaxing tha...”
“Very comfortable high, good effects of sativa and indica”

“This one delivers a clear-minded stoned. I deliberately call it a 'stoned' and not a 'high'. It definitely works on you body and the head. Sounds sound heavy, light has texture and touch hums and scents are thick. The strain almost as a minty taste at first, then herbal and earthy. That taste lasted throughout. I vape my herbs with the Arizer Air on blue until it stops delivering. There doesn't seem to be much in the...”

“Northern Skunk is by far my favorite strain I have come across. It always varies a little batch to batch but I found it to be the most consistent and very potent. It is a great saturday night smoke that can put you in a relaxed but coherent state. It is easy to be social and function on but at the same time, really helps anxiety and depression. Very uplifting!”
“Very nice high. Pretty bad munchies.:p very earthy flavor.”

“Sticky & hard bud that roughs up my throat, so I cough my way highness & happiness.  Northern Skunk is a Hybrid Indica, that made me feel very relaxed, not couch-locked & also has enough Sativa to keep headhigh for awhile. Very good Skunky & earthy flavor/taste.”
“very pungent smell and excellent taste. would definitely recommend”

“I got this as a pre-roll under a budtender's advice that it would be suitable pre-bedtime. Alas, it does not make me sleepy.

It's definitely a skunk, very pungent. And the smoke is acrid and makes me cough no matter how small a draw I take. I wasn't expecting that and it makes me wonder if that's a feature of skunks.

The first time I tried it, it was alright. Mild paranoia, moderate euphoria, mild disassociation. I...”
“It was love at first puff...❤️👍🏾😎”

“The heavens opened up and delivered from their own private garden, a strain of great importance. This strain rates up there in my top 20 for sure! I literally feel the warmest hug from all the rainbow farting unicorns when I smoke half a one paper doober. If you don't at least try this weed you should be pooped on from a great height. xoxo”
“I tried this strain and was delighted! A pleasant surprise,great for pain relief or depression.  Quality taste and aroma. Very euphoric with a smidgen of couch lock! Love it!”
“It's a fine strain. The sedation switch gets turned on upon first inhale. The full body effects pour in to the heart to immediately be spread throughout. A must try if you like Northern Lights.”
“Rating has not differed, nor have the effects. This is overall, a great, smooth, smoke and buzz. Great pain killing effects and no couch lock for this girl.”
“Not to bad, but took a while to hit me...”

“One of the best strains in existence, grabbed this at a hefty 40 and 8th from my local dispensary as a top shelf" "bud. Asked the bud tender for the best flower they had in stock and ended up with "Northern Skunk" Let me tell you this strain is straight 🔥🔥🔥 i have been a daily smoker for almost 5 years and this strain finds itself in my top 3. This strain provides a sweet

“Northern Lights x Super Skunk - super indica dom - not only relaxing, but euphoric and uplifting - an amplified GSC in my opinion - great indica with slight cerebral feel but chance of rest or couch lock as well which isn't bad for India seekers 👍”
“i smoked this with my good friend and we got so high we passed the fuck out and slept like babies it was some of the best weed i had in awhile”
“Also called Northern Bubba super relaxing Indica dominate, great for pain relief in day time while still focused for daytime activities.”
“great taste. burns well. nice buzz.”
“Great hybrid strain.  Perfect amount of energy with relaxing effects.  One of my favorite hybrids along with blue dream.”

“I love this strain. Have been growing her for over 3 years now and is my main medicine. Having previously had stomach ulcers from anti-inflammatory meds I switched to this as my main source of pain management. When I inhale its so smooth and easy to smoke. If your seeking a good pain management strain I find this one very good. 😊”
“northern skunk is a great hybrid for pain and it doesn't make me too sleepy, the batch I got was piney with a hint of skunky at the end. great high, great strain! thanks southern az”
“Excellent for body pain and relaxation. Excellent strain, the only downer is the sleepy, blurry dry eyes..”

“This is my main medicine, I grow it and vape.   Easy to grow and medium sized, no smell when growing.  Lets me sleep  and makes me happy.  Has a nice sweet taste and is tricky, be careful not to overdose by mistake.  When its cured well and aged its the best out there in my opinion. Very underrated.”

“Pretty surprised that this strain had no description!! I tried this and loved the taste, smell, and the feeling i got from it.  One of best strains I've had in a long time.  A new favorite for me lately”
“This strain is a powerful little hybrid great high and great relaxant as well with pain remedy for after a long haul at work or just a strenuous day.”

“the strain is a sweet tasting good flavoured strain with a soft but powerfull high thats feels amazing 

my opinion? 
5 stars ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐”
“One of the best highs and it tastes so good.  I got it as a shatter and it was very terpy.”
“Nice skunky strain. Really relaxing and calming. Love this strain!”
“sticky, sweet smell and taste, of  course the usual skunk attributes are present also, I enjoyed this flower very much, a must try.”
“Great Sativa, so uplifting that you just want to go outside and play some soccer. Made me Fall in Love with Mary Jane.”
“sweet tasting!!”
